title: What are some really cool latest software technologies in the market? - Quora

response.answer_text: Like InfoWorld itself, InfoWorld's Technology of the Year Awards have always been about change. We keep an eye out for the platforms and tools pushing against the barriers in application development, mobile, cloud computing, and in other corners of information technology, and we bring them in for review. At the end of the year, we get together and decide which are the very best. The Dell PowerEdge R730xd, brings together so much flash, disk, and elegance, it makes an ideal platform for software-defined storage solutions such as VMware's remarkable Virtual SAN (also a winner). The R730xd shows that innovation still lives in 2U, two-socket servers.It's fascinating what some vendors can do with commodity parts. The magic, of course, is in the software. In the Tintri VMstore, for example, the Tintri OS uses inline deduplication, compression, and other tricks to turn one part MLC flash and 10 parts SATA disk into something akin to an all-flash array for virtual machines. Lightning-fast flash delivers the IO, while disk provides the capacity.

Have you ever heard of Wooclap, it’s an amazing classroom response system (SAAS) that helps teachers make classes more fun and interactive for the students. At Wooclap, we also offer knowledge on how technology enhances classroom experiences! For that, check out our Wooclap website and Wooclap blog! Wooclap is a super simple, intuitive online polling system that is developed with the help of pedagogical engineers and teachers and professors across the globe! What it does is basically, it offers teachers a super easy platform through which they will integrate questions (polls, open questions, multiple choice questions,…) to their PPT presentation. This will enable them to ask the questions live during class and students will thus participate by using their smartphone, tablet or computer. It offers a great way to revolutionise the way you give classes and increases interaction and participation coming from your audience/students. We offer a solution at Wooclap that uses smartphones, tablets and computers in the learning process. It’s a great interactive tool and all you need is the link to the website and you can turn presentations, classes, meetings into a great interactive experience. Audience engagement is definitely guaranteed and it is very useful for both students and teachers.
